message: Kinda scared that piss dude might break his leg or some shit
lmaoooo he actually pissed himself eliteee

Getting sick of all the twists and turns, I know the anime focus on the team character development and other teams too but bruh, why shorty is mc, could have picked better? At least make him do his shots right

I know this comment was posted 5 months ago, but tf? That's the point of this anime, that even shorty mc can play basketball despite of being short. Besides, the mc does get his shots right 97% of the times (which is lot, imo.), you can't expect him to be perfect.
